definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
Panshi county level city in Jilin prefecture 吉林, Jilin province
Panshi county level city in Jilin prefecture 吉林, Jilin province
solid as a boulder (idiom); absolutely secure/rock-firm and unyielding
Panshi county level city in Jilin prefecture 吉林, Jilin province
Pan'an county in Jinhua 金華|金华[Jin1 hua2], Zhejiang
Pan'an county in Jinhua 金華|金华[Jin1 hua2], Zhejiang
as solid as rock (idiom); as sure as houses

sentences.english: Should one renounce Nirvana oneself, in order to help others towards it first?
sentences.chinese: 人應該放棄自己的涅磐，爲了首先幫助它人達到它？

sentences.english: Its Tochigi and Iwaki plants, north of Tokyo, would remain shut until Friday.
sentences.chinese: 位於東京北部櫪木和磐城的工廠將停產至週五。

sentences.english: More strange is the lingbi stone do rock.
sentences.chinese: 更奇的是擊之靈璧石做的磐。

sentences.english: Through the abandoning of what is there said to be Unbinding ?
sentences.chinese: 拋棄什麼，纔是人們所說的涅磐？

sentences.english: Nirvana is uncompounded, not made of anything yet it exists.
sentences.chinese: 涅磐是沒有混合的，不會由存在的東西構成。

sentences.english: Iwaki warned its residents about radioactive rain on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 週二，磐城市對當地居民發佈了放射性雨水警報。

sentences.english: Then he went down and stayed in a cave in the rock of Etam.
sentences.chinese: 他便下去，住在以坦磐的穴內。

sentences.english: Action Parinirvana possesses two kinds, which may have the two carnal bodies or four carnal bodies.
sentences.chinese: 行動涅磐有兩類，這有兩種肉身或四種肉體。

sentences.english: Hence we say that the Tathagata enters Great Nirvana.
sentences.chinese: 因此我們說如來進入了涅磐。

sentences.english: Life is the abnegation of self to gain the bliss of Nirvana.
sentences.chinese: 生命是爲了達到極樂的涅磐而摒棄自身。

sentences.english: He who orders his life a right realizes nirvana.
sentences.chinese: 他命令他的生命一正確認識涅磐。

sentences.english: Nirvana is immortally, the opposite of which is death.
sentences.chinese: 涅磐是不朽，相反的是死亡。

sentences.english: Before long the Parinibbana of the Tathagata will come about.
sentences.chinese: 不久之後如來即將涅磐。

sentences.english: We now see you the Buddha enter Nirvana And we are in the sea of suffering.
sentences.chinese: 我們現在看到佛陀進入了涅磐我們在痛苦的大海之中。

sentences.english: What constitutes the Path to Awakening and Nirvana?
sentences.chinese: 什麼是構成覺醒和涅磐的道路？

definition: Asarum/Wild ginger/also 細辛|细辛[xi4 xin1]
extending all the way across/running all the way through
to respect/to admire/to venerate/by the emperor himself
clear/vast and deep/classifier for a body of clear water
(of the day) long/old variant of 暢|畅[chang4]
